data.name: Battleborn: Season Pass
data.detailed_description: The Battleborn Season Pass gives you 5 Story Operations as they release, including “Attikus and the Thrall Rebellion,” “Toby's Friendship Raid,” and “Oscar Mike vs The Battle School;” instant access to 5 new heroes and early access a week before they release; digital bonuses; AND an exclusive gold skin for Alani and Cyber skin for Toby.
data.about_the_game: The Battleborn Season Pass gives you 5 Story Operations as they release, including “Attikus and the Thrall Rebellion,” “Toby's Friendship Raid,” and “Oscar Mike vs The Battle School;” instant access to 5 new heroes and early access a week before they release; digital bonuses; AND an exclusive gold skin for Alani and Cyber skin for Toby.
data.short_description: A tremendous band of heroes fight to protect the universe’s very last star from a mysterious evil in this next-gen shooter by the creators of Borderlands. Receive 5 DLC packs, each pack allowing you to command your Battleborn on all new Story Operations.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish*, Portuguese-Brazil, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 750/ AMD Phenom X4 945 3.0
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450/ Radeon HD 5770
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Compliant
  • Additional Notes: Initial installation requires an internet connection for Steam authentication, and gameplay; software installations require (included with the game) include Steam Client, DirectX 11, NVidia PhysX, .Net Framework 4.5, Visual C++ Redistributable 2010, and Visual C++ Redistributable 2012.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 7, 64-bit or Later
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Extreme CPU Q6850/ AMD A8-3870k (Quad Core CPU’s)
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD HD 7850/ NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or better, PhysX support
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 70 GB available space
